short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shdr is a live ESSL (GLSL) shader editor, viewer and validator powered by WebGL and built by Thibaut Despoulain (BKcore).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the chrome app version of Shdr, a live ESSL (GLSL) shader editor, viewer and validator powered by WebGL and built by Thibaut Despoulain (BKcore).

This shader editor has some cool features like inline error highlighting, real-time validation, live preview, code sharing and local storage.

You can try the online version on http://shdr.bkcore.com/
